alert.note: Alert for Haines Borough and Klukwan (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 07 at 9:52PM AKST until December 08 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches through early morning. * WHERE...Haines Highway west of Haines. * WHEN...Until 6 AM AKST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The highest snow accumulations are expected along the Haines Highway from mile marker 20 to the border. As of 7 PM Wedesday, webcam imagery and spotter reports confirm that appreciable snowfall continues to occur with around 9 inches of snow on the ground. Snowfall intensities are expected to diminish later this evening into the early morning hours Thursday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
